text: HubSpot collects data from publicly available sources or other third-party sources and discloses that information to our customers who purchase our enrichment products.

1. What Information We Collect and Process
After a reasonable period of time, we will either delete or anonymize your information or, if this is not possible, then we will securely store your information and isolate it from any further use until deletion is possible.
HubSpot's and our customers' legitimate interests are not more important than your privacy rights, and we process your data on the basis that people would expect their work-related data to be shared in this way.
